ops.description: Bank[6][3] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:40}); // {Barret}
“What're ya ignorant?
…I didn't mean that”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud},
you go on ahead too!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:37}); // {Tifa}
“What about me!? I'm human too!
Oh, do what you want, I'm going on!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud},
you go on ahead too!!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Barret}
“Don't know…
why…the hell…
we gotta…climb…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // {Cloud}
“…because we don't want to start
a commotion until we've saved
{Aeris}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:5}); // {Cloud}
“Knock it off. You're giving me the creeps.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Barret}
“So even you will fight for someone else.
Guess I figured you wrong.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // {Cloud}
“Who cares what you figured!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:8}); // {Barret}
“I'm just sayin'
mebbe I was wrong…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:10}); // {Cloud}
“What's that supposed
to mean, {Tifa}?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:11}); // {Barret}
“…how much farther do these
stairs go on?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Tifa}
“Why don't you ask them?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:13}); // {Barret}
“It's not one of them endless
stairways or somethin', is it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Tifa}
“Look, don't even ask!
We're way way way way far
away from being there, OK!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:32}); // {Barret}
“Damn, man!
I've had it! I'm going back!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:33}); // {Tifa}
“It'll take just as long to go down as
it did to come up.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:22}); // {Barret}
“Yo…
What floor is this?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:24}); // {Barret}
“Why they gotta build these buildings
so damn tall?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // {Barret}
“That Shinra…
They're just no damn good.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:28}); // {Barret}
“Marlene, daddy wanted to
see your face one more time…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:29}); // {Tifa}
“Would you stop acting like a
retard and climb!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:30}); // {Tifa}
“It's just a bit more!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:36}); // {Barret}
“Yeah well, all I know is I'm only
flesh 'n' blood…
'cept for this arm of mine.”{PAUSE}“Don't treat me like I'm some
ex-SOLDIER or somethin'…”

ops.raw: d0 af 00 e1 01 fd 0b af 00 45 01 fd 0b
d0 3c 00 e1 01 dc ff 3c 00 45 01 db ff
d0 ce ff bb 00 ab 0a ce ff 20 00 ab 0a

{Cloud}
“…because we don't want to start

{Barret}
“So even you will fight for someone else.

“I'm just sayin'
mebbe I was wrong…”

stairs go on?”

“It's not one of them endless

“Look, don't even ask!
We're way way way way far
away from being there, OK!?”

so damn tall?”

{Barret}
“That Shinra…
They're just no damn good.”

{Barret}
“Marlene, daddy wanted to
see your face one more time…”

“Would you stop acting like a
retard and climb!?”

{Barret}
“Damn, man!
I've had it! I'm going back!”

“It'll take just as long to go down as
it did to come up.”

{Barret}
“Yeah well, all I know is I'm only
flesh 'n' blood…
'cept for this arm of mine.”{PAUSE}“Don't treat me like I'm some
ex-SOLDIER or somethin'…”

{Tifa}
“What about me!? I'm human too!
Oh, do what you want, I'm going on!”
